title: Sheridan Smith sparks pregnancy speculation among fans
text:
Sheridan Smith has sparked speculation she could be expecting her first child.

The 38-year-old actress posted about her 'morning sickness' on Monday morning as she prepared to embark on a musical theatre cruise, prompting her fans to congratulate her.

Alongside a picture of her VIP passes, Sherdian - who is engaged to Jamie Horn - wrote: 'About to set sail for 4 days, wish me luck with my morning sickness'.

Dropping hints? Sheridan Smith has sparked speculation she could be expecting her first child after joking about her 'morning sickness' on Monday

Taking the news as confirmation she might be pregnant, her followers were quick to extend their well wishes and congratulate her.

One posted, 'Morning sickness?! Huge congratulations xxxx', while another shared, 'Oh wow what fantastic news ♥️❤'.

A third wrote, Wow, thank you for sharing your wonderful news with us! Congratulations ❤', and a fourth fan enthused. 'Omg...are you having a baby.. if so congratulations'.

Sheridan also shared an Instagram story of her fiancé on board the Stages musical cruise with her, further prompting fan theories by calling him 'Daddy Cool'.

Post: Alongside a picture of her VIP passes, Sherdian wrote: 'About to set sail for 4 days, wish me luck with my morning sickness'

She giggled: 'Daddy Cool... We're in our little cabin!', while panning the cameras around the room.

Sheridan had recently hinted she was thinking of starting a family with her partner Jamie.

The actress and singer recently starred in a production of Joseph And The Amazing Technicolour Dreamcoat and the kids she worked with during the production left her feeling broody.

Speaking to The Mirror, she said: 'I can’t tell you how much I love the kids. I am gonna miss them so much. They are all an utter joy and have made the whole experience for me.

'I will cherish the memories and watch their careers flourish. Me and Jamie now are thinking of making me a mamma. All thanks to these amazing souls.'

Family: Sheridan had recently hinted she was thinking of having a child with her partner Jamie, saying, 'Me and Jamie now are thinking of making me a mamma'

Sheridan recently shut down speculation that she is secretly married to Jamie after she called him her 'hubby' in a now deleted Twitter snap.

The Cilla star was quizzed about her marital status during an appearance on This Morning after she shared a picture wearing two bands on her ring finger.

Yet she set the record straight by insisting that the couple have not tied the knot, before hinting that their big day could be right around the corner.

Sheridan explained: 'I do wear two bands on my hand, mainly because this one is too big and it does keep it on.

'But Jamie does wear his wedding ring, we're not actually married, we just do it. My friends do that but no one actually talks about it...

'We didn't think about it when we took a picture and put it on Twitter and then of course everyone thought that we were married.'

Sheridan met Jamie on mobile dating app Tinder nearly two years ago, and now lives with him at her country home in Kent.
description: Sheridan Smith has sparked speculation she could be expecting her first child after sharing a cryptic Instagram post on Monday.
